roleset.name: prudent, wise
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Wouldn't be prudent
example.text: It 'll cost a lot to do it which-2 *T*-2 would not be advisable at the current time with the economic situation not looking rosy ,
example.arg: with the economic situation not looking rosy ,
